__comment_email_account: EMAIL_ACCOUNT should be set to your target email account; E.G.: joe_example@example.com
__comment_password: PASSWORD should be a hex string that you can get through you email host api; it will looke something like: vutfjdjwvxcqzoty
__comment_host: EMAIL_SERVER_HOST should be a string in the format of protocol.host.com; E.G.: imap.gmail.com
